resource_notes: Critical foundation for all microservices. Requires deep knowledge of AKS networking and identity.
alternative_approach: Use Azure Portal for prototype (not recommended for production)
risk_factors: Azure quota limits or IAM propagation delays
mitigation_strategy: Apply early in sprint; Pre-check quotas

resource_notes: Identity Experience Framework (XML) is complex and error-prone.
mitigation_strategy: Assign Senior Backend Lead; Allocate buffer for research

resource_notes: Core offline functionality. High logic density.
mitigation_strategy: Offload UI components or unit tests to Frontend Developer

resource_notes: Requires experience with Redis Pub/Sub adapters.
